long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remove All Shorts Videos from YouTube.

This extension removes all the shorts videos from the YouTube homepage, tabs, search, explore and also subscriptions.

# Update 2.1.5 - Dec 1, 2024
- Once again, YouTube keeps breaking the extension with their constant platform changes, causing issues with detecting and removing Shorts from feeds. But not to worry—I’ve fixed it! so Shorts will now be removed more quickly after being identified, even with YouTube's frequent updates.
